subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar’s most popular driver, competing for Hendrick Motorsports, has a string of top-10 finishes entering the 5-Hour Energy 500 at Pocono Raceway.
snippet: Nascar’s most popular driver, competing for Hendrick Motorsports, has a string of top-10 finishes entering the 5-Hour Energy 500 at Pocono Raceway.
